amuse.data.datasets
Class ClassifierConfigSet

java.lang.Object
  amuse.data.io.DataSetAbstract
      amuse.data.io.ArffDataSet
          amuse.data.datasets.AbstractArffExperimentSet
              amuse.data.datasets.ClassifierConfigSet
All Implemented Interfaces:
ArffExperimentSetInterface
public class ClassifierConfigSet
extends AbstractArffExperimentSet

This class represents a list of classification tasks as used in AMUSE. Serialisation to ARFF is supported.

Version:
$Id: $
Author:
Clemens Waeltken
